title: Input
description: An input for the validation pipepline.

truthset.description: Path to a VCF file for the truth set of variants

truthset_genome.description: Genome version of the truth set

queryset.description: Path to a VCF file for the query set of variants

queryset_genome.description: Genome version of the query set

conf_regions.description: Path to a BED file containing high-confidence regions in the reference genome of the query set that should be used for the comparison.

limit_regions.description: Path to a BED file containing regions that the analysis should be limited to. These could for example be when comparin WES or panel data with WGS data and you want to limit the comparison to captured regions of the genome. The genome version should match with the query set

coverage.description: Path to a d4 file that represents the coverage in the query sample.

coverage_regions.description: Path to a bed file with regions that should be focused on in the coverage analysis. Coordinates represent the genome version used for the query set.

errorMessage: Expected at least one row in the input file
